sentences.english: While Rowhani indicated he favors improving ties with the international community.
sentences.chinese: 雖然魯哈尼表示他贊成改善與國際社會的關係。

sentences.english: The traditional music of the Hanis is a large music system.
sentences.chinese: 哈尼族傳統音樂文化是一個龐大的音樂體系。

sentences.english: Miss Huneysuckel headed down Main Street towards the Bank.
sentences.chinese: 哈尼沙克朝着主街上的儲蓄所走去。

sentences.english: And I also have a number of Hani friends.
sentences.chinese: 我還有好幾位哈尼族的朋友呢。

sentences.english: Haniel Group is a multinational company based in Germany, established 250 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 哈尼爾集團是一家德國公司，成立於年前。

sentences.english: Yuanyang, a Hani minority settlement with vast rice- terraces .
sentences.chinese: 元陽縣，哈尼族居住區，有大片稻穀梯田。

sentences.english: Kristin Haney and Mello went head to head for the hot seat match.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯汀哈尼和梅洛到頭部，以頭的熱點座位匹配。

sentences.english: Oh, I know the Hani ethnic group.
Harnett said the USAF has no knowledge of any similar incidents happening before.
sentences.chinese: 哈尼特說，美國空軍之前根本不知道會發生類似事故。

sentences.english: We Aini people, are a branch of the ethnic Hani minority.
sentences.chinese: 我們愛伲人，是哈尼族的一個分支。

sentences.english: France said it was willing to work with Mr. Rouhani on the nuclear issue and the conflict in Syria.
sentences.chinese: 法國稱願意與魯哈尼一道解決核問題和敘利亞衝突。

sentences.english: He kissed his wife, Dema, and young sons, Nabeel and Hani.
sentences.chinese: 扎威爾親吻了妻子德瑪和兩個小兒子納比爾和哈尼。

sentences.english: Still, Rowhani, a former nuclear negotiator , suggests there is room from compromise.
sentences.chinese: 而身爲前核談判代表的魯哈尼表示仍然有妥協的餘地。

sentences.english: Jehan Harney in the United States submitted a film called "The Color of Veil."
sentences.chinese: 查漢哈尼在美國提交了這部名爲“彩色的面紗。”

definition: Jingpo ethnic group of Tibet and Yunnan
Wa, Kawa or Va ethnic group of Myanmar, south China and southeast Asia
